// Fog on floor just past character development tutorial

//
// Generated by Microsoft (R) HLSL Shader Compiler 9.29.952.3111
//
// Parameters:
//
//   float4x4 matMV;
//   float4x4 matMVP;
//   float4 vs_extends;
//
//
// Registers:
//
//   Name         Reg   Size
//   ------------ ----- ----
//   matMV        c0       4
//   matMVP       c8       4
//   vs_extends   c64      1
//

    vs_3_0
    dcl_position v0
    dcl_position o0
    dcl_texcoord o1
    dcl_texcoord1 o2
    dcl_texcoord2 o3.xyz
    dcl_texcoord3 o4.xyz
    dcl_texcoord4 o5.xyz
    dcl_texcoord5 o6.xyz

def c220, 0, 1, 0.0625, 0.5
dcl_2d s0

    mul r0.xyz, c64, v0
    mul r1, r0.y, c1
    mad r1, c0, r0.x, r1
    mad r1, c2, r0.z, r1
    add o2, r1, c3
    mul r1, r0.y, c9
    mad r1, c8, r0.x, r1
    mad r0, c10, r0.z, r1
    add r0, r0, c11
    mov o0, r0

// Automatic vertex shader halo fix inserted with DarkStarSword's shadertool.py:
// shadertool.py -i -f --auto-fix-vertex-halo --git VertexShader_345_CRC32_F10EBB20.txt
texldl r2, c220.z, s0
add r2.w, r0.w, -r2.y
mad r0.x, r2.w, r2.x, r0.x

    mov o1, r0
    mov o3.xyz, c3
    mov o4.xyz, c0
    mov o5.xyz, c1
    mov o6.xyz, c2

// approximately 15 instruction slots used
